channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Energy storage industry set aggressive goals for 2025 — and already crushed them
item.description: The battery storage industry in the U.S. has grown in leaps and bounds in recent years, surpassing its most aggressive targets to become one of the la...

item.title: How Long Should You Stay in a Sauna? (2025)
item.description: Optimize your sauna session by listening to the experts and, more importantly, your body.

item.title: In its first DSA penalty, EU fines X €120M for ‘deceptive’ blue check verification system
item.description: The EC is taking issue with the fact that X, the social network formerly known as Twitter, has been allowing anyone to buy a "blue checkmark," the pla...

item.title: Petco confirms security lapse exposed customers’ personal data
item.description: The pet company has published almost no details about what happened, who was affected, and what personal data was exposed.

item.title: Huge Trove of Nude Images Leaked by AI Image Generator Startup’s Exposed Database
item.description: An AI image generator startup’s database was left accessible to the open internet, revealing more than 1 million images and videos, including photos o...

item.title: Netflix to acquire Warner Bros. in a disruptive deal valued at $82.7B
item.description: In one of the most groundbreaking deals the streaming world has ever seen, Netflix acquires Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion.

item.title: Logitech Promo Code: $25 Off This Holiday Season
item.description: Get an exclusive discount of $25 off $200+ this holiday season when you sign up for Logitech emails.

item.title: Naturepedic Promo Codes and Deals: 20% Off
item.description: Save on Naturepedic’s line of organic, thoughtfully crafted mattresses and bedding with our coupon codes for this month.

item.title: Meta signs commercial AI data agreements with publishers to offer real-time news on Meta AI
item.description: Meta is partnering with CNN, Fox News, Fox Sports, Le Monde Group, the People Inc. portfolio of media brands, The Daily Caller, The Washington Examine...

item.title: Walmart-backed PhonePe winds down its Pincode app in yet another e-commerce step back
item.description: PhonePe has shut down its Pincode app over two years after its debut.
